title: Bug 120315: Display property 'none' does not take effect in new PDF emitter
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, the item is still visible in the generated PDF document.
EB: The item with the display property set to 'none' should not be visible in the generated PDF document.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label to the document.
2. Open the 'properties' view.
3. Set the sectionDisplay property of the label to 'none'.
4. Generate the PDF document.
5. Verify that the label with the 'none' display property is not visible in the PDF document.
